Question: Dadam Co.,Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Dadam Co.,Ltd

CES 2024 Product Highlight

- Introducing the latest smart home automation system
- Features voice control and integration with popular virtual assistants
- Offers advanced security features such as facial recognition and motion detection
- Compatible with a wide range of smart devices and appliances
- Provides real-time monitoring and remote access through a dedicated mobile app
Summary_cn:
大当公司有限公司

2024 CES产品亮点

- 推出最新的智能家居自动化系统
- 具备语音控制和与热门虚拟助手的集成功能
- 提供先进的安全功能，如人脸识别和动作检测
- 兼容各种智能设备和家电
- 通过专用移动应用程序提供实时监控和远程访问功能
